caption.title: Context-specific false-recent rate (FRR) against MDRI in three demonstrative surveillance scenarios (assuming imperfect ARV testing).
caption.p: A: Scenario similar to South African epidemic. B: Scenario similar to Kenyan epidemic. C: Concentrated epidemic scenario. A supplementary viral load threshold of >1,000c/mL is used throughout. We assume ARV exposure testing reduces false recency in treated individuals to 10% of that attained when no supplemental viral load threshold is utilized.
Click here for additional data file.
